SEARCH
Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services.interfaces

Interface FlightService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlightServiceImpl
public interface FlightService
Interface for managing flight operations in the flight booking system.

  • Method Details

    • createFlight

      @Transactional FlightEntity createFlight(FlightEntity flight)
      Creates a new flight.
      Parameters:
      flight - the Flight object to be created.
      Returns:
      the created Flight object.

    • getFlightById

      FlightEntity getFlightById(Long id)
      Retrieves a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Flight object if found, null otherwise.

    • getAllFlights

      List<FlightEntity> getAllFlights()
      Retrieves all flights.
      Returns:
      a list of all Flight objects.

    • getFlightsByAirplaneType

      List<FlightEntity> getFlightsByAirplaneType(EFlightAirplane airplaneType)
      Retrieves flights by the type of airplane.
      Parameters:
      airplaneType - the type of airplane for the flights to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a list of Flight objects that match the airplane type.

    • updateFlight

      FlightEntity updateFlight(FlightEntity updatedFlight)
      Updates the details of an existing flight.
      Parameters:
      updatedFlight - the updated Flight object.
      Returns:
      the updated Flight object.

    • updateFlightAvailability

      void updateFlightAvailability()
      Updates the availability status of all flights.

    • deleteFlight

      boolean deleteFlight(Long id)
      Deletes a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the flight was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
